body:
>OY VEY GOYIM IT’S NOT THE JEWS

Paid shill confirmed.

>It's the atheist secular left

Created by jews.

>which includes lapsed Jews

They’re not “lapsed.” They’re still religious jews doing exactly what the Talmud says to do.

>Orthodox Jews hate this shit as much as we do.

No. They don’t. They support it completely. Because the goyim are animals in human form and the laws of the goyim do not apply to the jews. Read the Talmud sometime.

>You think Susy Goldstein writing in the NYT about how much she hates white men and religion, and how climate change is racist, is going to sheol each Sunday?

1. No, she’s not going to hell every Sunday, just at the end of her life.
2. Yep; she learned her ideology from the Talmud and the rabbis who raised her.

body:
>Respectfully speaking, eat a dick.

Great argument.

>If the Talmud is anything like the Old Testament, they most certainly do not.

It’s not. Maybe if you’d stop pretending you don’t read it every day, we could get away from humiliating you whenever you defend jews like this, hmm?

>They worship false idols.

K.

>They have sex out of wedlock.

K.

>They lie and cheat and steal.

K.

>The Talmud tells them to do none of that.

It does, yeah. It explicitly tells them that the laws of the goyim aren’t the laws of the jews and that they don’t have to be obeyed. It explicitly tells them that the goyim are animals in human flesh and that nothing they own is actually owned by them, so murdering non-jews, stealing from them, and all the other “transgressions” are actually acts of holiness, since all of creation was made for the jews. Meanwhile, Frankist jews (read: most modern jews, and the ones of which you speak) consider all sins holiness and all holiness sin. Their engagement in acts of “holy tikkun” include all the manners of degeneracy which today pervade the West.

>Then are people like Ben Shapiro

Who supports world jewry and denounces white nationalism.

>Dennis Prager

Who supports world jewry and denounces white nationalism.

>John Podhoretz

Refresh me on what he does…
 
>are what? Grifters? Controlled opposition? Larpers?

Bingo! Read *Rules for Radicals* sometime. Or anything written by Lenin. That’s exactly what they do. Your next line is “DA REPUBLIKINS R TOTALLY A REAL PARTY AND TOTALLY DON’T DO WHAT THE DEMOCRATS WANT THEY’RE NOT CONTROOOOOOOOLLED OPPOSITION!”

>There are easier ways for them to make money

Contrary to the stereotype, it’s not *all* about money for the jews. Controlling the narrative–making sure they are the ones in charge of what all of their cattle believe–is far, FAR more important. Why do you think they allow their media companies to operate at a loss? Why do you think they destroy the franchises people know and love, replacing them with communist propaganda? It’s because they don’t care about revenue. Why do you think they shut down any website they don’t control? Why do you think they created the ✡alt-right✡ in the first place? **They care about ensuring that NO ONE, ANYWHERE, is allowed to think ANYTHING other than what they approve.**

body:
> the Torah, which is basically the same as the Old Testament.

No.

> And it's all just a long-con to you? Bullshit.

Sorry you’re incapable of seeing what has literally happened right before your eyes? Not sure what you want me to say.

 The simpler answer is the one Occam's Razor suggests. That Jews, like any group of people, don't all believe the same thing, no more than Christians all believe the same thing.

Learn what the definition of words are.

> They don't. 

They do.

>You think they're losing money?

Yeesh, learn how to read.

>You're paranoid.

Not an argument.

> "they" aren't strictly Jews. Find the common denominator. It's not Jews.

If you replaced just Turner Broadcasting System’s 10 executives, CNN’s 11 executives, and CNN’s 17 hosts with members of the public chosen at random, the odds of a jewish majority in all three is 1:4,620,054,353,091,400,000,000,000. One in four septillion, six hundred twenty sextillion, fifty-four quintillion, three hundred fifty-three quadrillion, ninety-one trillion, four hundred billion. Yet 5 of 10 Turner executives, 6 of 11 CNN executives, and 9 of 17 CNN hosts are jewish. What about the ratio of jews to non-jewish whites? Excluding other minorities. 5 of 9 (Turner execs), 6 of 10 (CNN execs), and 9 of 15 (CNN hosts) are jewish. 20 out of 34 total. If you filled those positions with non-minority members of the public–chosen at random from only a pool of whites and jews–the odds of a jewish majority in all three positions is 1:92,026,493,323,110,000,000,000,000. One in ninety-two septillion, twenty-six sextillion, four hundred ninety-three quintillion, three hundred twenty-three quadrillion, one hundred ten trillion.

These numbers are too large to process–much less comprehend–so analogies help us understand. If you bought three Powerball tickets (each with a roughly 1:292 million chance to win), it is 20 times more likely that you would win the Powerball on all three tickets than a jewish majority appearing at random. If you and I–just two people–were separately transported, at random, to stars anywhere in the observable universe (a sphere 93 billion light years across, estimated to contain 2 trillion galaxies, each of which has around 100 million stars), it is 100 times more likely that we would end up on the same star than a jewish majority appearing at random.

In 1983, 50 companies owned 90% of US media. Over time, Congress and the FCC performed “deregulation” on the media. The number of television stations one company can own increased from 7 to 12 in 1985. The FCC also stopped enforcing the Fairness Doctrine. This enforced a minimum amount of non-entertainment programming and limited the amount of advertising broadcast in an hour. Those changes made it easier–and more profitable–for corporations to own more media properties. In 1996, the Telecommunications Act lifted the 40 radio station ownership cap, leading to rapid consolidation of the industry. A 2004 appeals court decision struck down more media ownership rules. Today, 6 corporations in the US–with branches and sub-companies around the world–own 90% of US media. These companies are Disney, Comcast, Time-Warner, Viacom, CBS, and News Corp. Significant proportions of media in other parts of the Western world, such as Sky Media, are subsidiaries of these six companies. Print, radio, and television, all owned by 6 companies, all led by jews.

Sorry you’re incapable of seeing what has literally happened right before your eyes? Not sure what you want me to say.

The simpler answer is the one Occam's Razor suggests. That Jews, like any group of people, don't all believe the same thing, no more than Christians all believe the same thing.

Learn what the definition of words are.

They don't.

They do.

You think they're losing money?

Yeesh, learn how to read.

Not an argument.

If you replaced just Turner Broadcasting System’s 10 executives, CNN’s 11 executives, and CNN’s 17 hosts with members of the public chosen at random, the odds of a jewish majority in all three is 1:4,620,054,353,091,400,000,000,000. One in four septillion, six hundred twenty sextillion, fifty-four quintillion, three hundred fifty-three quadrillion, ninety-one trillion, four hundred billion. body:
>first several

OH GEE, SO ITS NOT THE SAME. Thanks for admitting it, dumb fuck. You did what I wanted you to do by actually researching the topic before spouting off on it.

> You accused me of being Jewish because I knew what the Talmud is

 No one said this. You’re illiterate. Do not post again.

>’Stop replying"?

Stop replying. You know nothing about what is being discussed. You can’t hold a conversation on this subject. You’re a waste of everyone’s time.

 >You're sad and toxic and I feel sorry for you.

No one gives a flying fuck what your feelings are, leftist whore.. You’re objectively wrong and cannot provide any information on the topic at hand.

>Leave this site. Go outside. And make some friends. If you continue down this path, you're going to end up killing yourself.

You have no power over anyone here. You’re too stupid to know what a jew is and are whining like a toddler when you got called out for injecting your retardation into someone else’s conversation. Shut the fuck up and go the fuck away, retard.

No one gives a flying fuck what your feelings are, leftist whore.. You’re objectively wrong and cannot provide any information on the topic at hand.

Leave this site. Go outside. And make some friends. If you continue down this path, you're going to end up killing yourself.

You have no power over anyone here. You’re too stupid to know what a jew is and are whining like a toddler when you got called out for injecting your retardation into someone else’s conversation. Shut the fuck up and go the fuck away, retard.
